DOC.brief_summary: Tracheal intubation general anaesthesia gold standard secure airway protect lung gastric aspiration . The conventional technique involve use metal laryngoscope insert mouth create air space , allow insertion endotracheal tube . Alternatively , oral airway device ( call supraglottic device ( SGD ) ) use tracheal intubation . The SGD first insert . A fibrescope insert shaft SGD trachea . This allow endotracheal tube ( previously pre-loaded onto fibrescope ) railroad fibrescope trachea . This technique call 'low skill fibreoptic intubation ' SGD act guide fibrescope . Our study compare performance two SGD : i-gel air-Q . The investigator compare intubation success rate , insertion rate , time SGD insertion intubation .
DOC.brief_title: Low Skill Fibreoptic Intubation I-gel v Air-Q
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator test see fibreoptic intubation patient via supraglottic airway device i.e . 'low skill fibreoptic intubation ' ( LSFOI ) successful via i-gel® air-Q® . Patients schedule elective surgery general anaesthesia would normally require tracheal intubation . The investigator 's hypothesis base result investigator 's recent manikin study ( CIRB 2014/2039 ) . The investigator would like see hypothesis translates patient . It also test secondary outcome e.g . SGD insertion success rate time , intubation time . In aforementioned manikin study , air-Q® perform good SGD insertion rate time . However , i-gel® perform good intubation success rate time . The device may perform different due difference device : design ( shape , volume , length , aperture ) , material composition , technique require insertion intubation . 24 adult patient undergo elective surgery require general anaesthesia endotracheal intubation major operate theater Singapore General Hospital enrol . The patient randomise equal proportion two group , either air-Q® i-gel® . Patients undergo induction general anaesthesia standardise fashion accordance usual practice investigator 's department anaesthesia . Intubation proceed assign airway device . Data collect include successful endotracheal intubation , evidence presence end tidal carbon dioxide capnograph . Time intubation ( initial handle airway device successful intubation confirm successful lung ventilation ) , number attempt require view achieve ( accord modify Cormack Lehane score system ) also record . Injuries lip , teeth upper airway seek document blind observer Post Anesthetic Care Unit . A protocol provide standardise induction general anaesthesia . This involve application standard patient monitor , period pre-oxygenation , administration anaesthetic agent muscle relaxant . If patient desaturates SpO2 < 94 % intubation , intubation attempt via either air-Q® i-gel® abandon intubation proceed use conventional direct laryngoscope .
DOC.criteria: Patients physical status American Society Anesthesiologists ( ASA ) grade I/II 21 year old , elective surgery , require endotracheal intubation ASA class III/IV Patients history previous difficult endotracheal intubation Patients two predictor difficult airway management ( criterion 18 , ) 1 . Airway mass 2 . Mallampati ( oropharygneal space grade ) III IV 3 . Thyromental distance < 6.5cm 4 . Interincisor distance < 3 cm 5 . Head extension < 30 degree 6 . Edentulous 7 . Large beard 8 . Obstructive sleep apnoea ( OSA ) snorer Patients need rapid sequence induction Pregnant woman
